document_data.mainbody: Arilyn Dathlue was a maker of harps and owner of Heartsong Harps in the city of Silverymoon in the Silver Marches in the late 14 century DR. Around 1372 DR, Arilyn was a regular client of Chesmyr Morrowynd, a maker of harp strings, and they met to do business in Swordsfall House.
